pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h3",null,{"id":"介绍","children":"介绍"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Anaconda 是一个用于科学计算的 Python 发行版，支持 Linux, Mac, Windows, 包含了众多流行的科学计算、数据分析的 Python 包。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Anaconda 安装包可以到以下链接下载。"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/archive/"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"配置","children":"配置"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["镜像站提供了 Anaconda 仓库与第三方源（conda-forge、msys2、pytorch 等，各镜像站镜像的第三方源并不相同，可以参考下方「第三方镜像源」一节）的镜像，各系统都可以通过修改用户目录下的 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":".condarc"}]," 文件来使用镜像站。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["不同系统下的",["$r","code",null,{"children":".condarc"}],"目录如下："]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Linux: ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"${HOME}/.condarc"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["macOS: ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"${HOME}/.condarc"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Windows: ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"C:\Users\<YourUserName>\.condarc"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"注："}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Windows 用户无法直接创建名为 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":".condarc"}]," 的文件，可先执行 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"conda config --set show_channel_urls yes"}]," 生成该文件之后再修改。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["由于更新过快难以同步，TUNA 等镜像站不同步",["$r","code",null,{"children":"pytorch-nightly"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"pytorch-nightly-cpu"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"ignite-nightly"}],"这三个包。"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"如果您正在从某一镜像源切换到另一镜像源，请检查镜像源是否同步了您所需要的 repo，以及该 repo 是否支持您使用的平台 (e.g. linux-64)。"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"为了保证以下配置在所有镜像站可用，配置中只加入了少量必须的第三方源，您可以在下方的列表中自行寻找并添加其他第三方源。"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"~/.condarc","code":"channels:
  - defaults
show_channel_urls: true
default_channels:
  - {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/pkgs/main
  - {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/pkgs/r
  - {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/pkgs/msys2
custom_channels:
  conda-forge: {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/cloud
  pytorch: {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/cloud","codeLanguage":"yaml"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"即可添加 Anaconda Python 免费仓库。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["运行 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"conda clean -i"}]," 清除索引缓存，保证用的是镜像站提供的索引。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["运行 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"conda create -n myenv numpy"}]," 测试一下吧。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"第三方源列表","children":"第三方源列表"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"您可以遵循上述配置文件中的格式添加第三方源（推荐），或者通过以下命令添加第三方源"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"menus":[{"title":"第三方源","items":[["conda-forge",{"channel":"conda-forge"}],["atztogo",{"channel":"atztogo"}],["auto",{"channel":"auto"}],["biobakery",{"channel":"biobakery"}],["bioconda",{"channel":"bioconda"}],["c4aarch64",{"channel":"c4aarch64"}],["caffe2",{"channel":"caffe2"}],["deepmodeling",{"channel":"deepmodeling"}],["dglteam",{"channel":"dglteam"}],["fastai",{"channel":"fastai"}],["fermi",{"channel":"fermi"}],["idaholab",{"channel":"idaholab"}],["intel",{"channel":"intel"}],["matsci",{"channel":"matsci"}],["menpo",{"channel":"menpo"}],["MindSpore",{"channel":"MindSpore"}],["mordred-descriptor",{"channel":"mordred-descriptor"}],["msys2",{"channel":"msys2"}],["numba",{"channel":"numba"}],["ohmeta",{"channel":"ohmeta"}],["omnia",{"channel":"omnia"}],["Paddle",{"channel":"Paddle"}],["peterjc123",{"channel":"peterjc123"}],["plotly",{"channel":"plotly"}],["psi4",{"channel":"psi4"}],["pytorch",{"channel":"pytorch"}],["pytorch3d",{"channel":"pytorch3d"}],["pytorch-lts",{"channel":"pytorch-lts"}],["pytorch-test",{"channel":"pytorch-test"}],["pyviz",{"channel":"pyviz"}],["qiime2",{"channel":"qiime2"}],["rapidsai",{"channel":"rapidsai"}],["rdkit",{"channel":"rdkit"}],["simpleitk",{"channel":"simpleitk"}],["soumith",{"channel":"soumith"}],["stackless",{"channel":"stackless"}],["ursky",{"channel":"ursky"}],["viscid-hub",{"channel":"viscid-hub"}]]}],"code":"conda config --set custom_channels.{{channel}} {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/cloud/"}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"tuna-等站","children":"TUNA 等站"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"auto"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"biobakery"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"bioconda"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"c4aarch64"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"caffe2"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"conda-forge"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"deepmodeling"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"dglteam"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"fastai"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"fermi"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"idaholab"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"intel"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"matsci"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"menpo"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"MindSpore"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"mordred-descriptor"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"msys2"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"numba"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"ohmeta"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"omnia"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Paddle"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"peterjc123"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"plotly"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"psi4"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"pytorch"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"pytorch3d"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"pytorch-lts"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"pytorch-test"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"pyviz"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"qiime2"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"rapidsai"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"rdkit"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"simpleitk"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"stackless"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"ursky"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"sjtug","children":"SJTUG"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"atztogo"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"bioconda"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"conda-forge"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"dglteam"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"matsci"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"menpo"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"pytorch"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"pytorch-lts"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"pytorch-test"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"soumith"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"viscid-hub"}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"sustech-anaconda-extra","children":"SUSTech anaconda-extra"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["SUSTech 在 anaconda-extra 中还提供了 nvidia channel，参考 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/anaconda-extra/","children":"Anaconda Extra 帮助"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"miniconda-镜像使用帮助","children":"Miniconda 镜像使用帮助"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Miniconda 是一个 Anaconda 的轻量级替代，默认只包含了 python 和 conda，但是可以通过 pip 和 conda 来安装所需要的包。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Miniconda 安装包可以到以下链接下载。"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/miniconda/"}]]}]

meta.title: Anaconda 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
